scenario_text.value: (Why’s Miyuki crouching over there?)

(And by herself without Haru, too.
That’s not normal.)
Hey, Miyuki. What are you doing?

(She’s always so difficult to talk to. I’m
never sure how I should approach her.)
...Over there.
What? Is there something special over there?
(I don’t see anything “over there.”)
(What is Miyuki seeing?)

(Will she tell me if I flat out ask her?
Maybe an indirect approach is better.)
(How should I approach Miyuki?)
Is something there?
Say something, anything!
Say I see nothing...
What’s over there?

(All I see in that direction is...
the forest.)

(That’s all.
There are too many trees to see much else.)

Oh, that thing?
As in, that thing over there?

(I tried to play along,
but she still won’t say a peep.)

I can’t see anything.
You have good eyesight, Miyuki.
(I don’t know what else to ask.)
(I still don’t know what it is she saw.)
(Miyuki sure is mysterious...)

(She’s still not talking.
I should go check on the others.)
